CustomField.description: The explanation which will be presented to the user in a response email. Will occur in a setnance like "...the flight was delayed/cancelled due to EXPLANATION. This is an event outside SAS control...". This explanation will only appear in emails where the customer's claim is denied.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The explanation which will be presented to the user in a response email. Will occur in a setnance like "...the flight was delayed/cancelled due to EXPLANATION. This is an event outside SAS control...". This explanation will only appear in emails where the customer's claim is denied.
CustomField.label: Eligibility Explanation
